>>37695953

The crowd seems to have stopped arguing, and it's not quite so cold in the square anymore. It's noticeably quieter. A few people stare at you as you head back toward one side of the street with Nel at your side.

“I'm sorry.” He says. “I feel better now.”

> It's about time to meet up with the rest of your pick-up group.
> You've got more things to do around town first. (Write-in.)
